Just because one is a "virgin" (a term that has so many differing variations it's rediculous) doesn't mean they have not had a sexual experience. On top of that, one does not need to have had sex in order to understand it. Nevertheless, kudos to thelmoose for adding another dimension to the debate. I have found it endlessly annoying to discover that yet another dried up old priest who is either celibate and/or totally hates women is behind an anti-choice initiative. If the "celibate" priesthood of the Roman Catholic Church were better informed about sexuality, in particular their own individual sexuality, they might not be so eager to leap on the anti-choice bandwagon.
